items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great party dress!
items.body: This is a lovely dress! Fits me perfectly (5'4" and 120lbs). Very comfortable and sexy. No hemming required to wear flat shoes. I got tons of compliments on it at the holiday party I wore it to. Read more
items.author: Susie Mutter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, Elegant and Cute
items.body: Absolutely loved this dress! Was skeptical at first because thought it would come super see through or something of that sort. Material was pretty decent for the cost, super stretchy and comfortable. The dress was sheer and elegant and decently layered in material. Iâ€™m only like between 5â€™0-5â€™1 and with a short pair of heels the dress was not too long. Definitely recommend ðŸ¤ŽðŸ˜Š Read more
items.author: Justin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy and chic wedding guest dress
items.body: I received compliments on this dress as a wedding guest and found it classy with the sleeves and deep blue shade, yet chic with the slit and ruffles. It was comfortable, true to size, and flattering, especially with the ruching. It held up well after a delicate, cold water wash cycle in a front loading machine and hanging it to dry. I was concerned it might tear due to somewhat thin material but it held up well. Wrinkling wasnâ€™t excessive but I still recommend steaming. Read more
items.author: Alpa

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress, seems not someone correctly/puckering!
items.body: This is a beautifully made dress and it should be noted that some of the photos from the seller show the slip being very high. It is not. It comes to just above the knee which is classic, elegant and perfect. The toll up/ruffled Ham line flows beautifully when you walk. however, I had to return it because the same at the hip on the right side is puckered and from the back it makes your body look deformed. If not for that I would've kept the dress. It has a lining and is well worth the money, however, I didn't feel like taking the chance to exchange it for another one as the material would lend itself to that happening more often than not with the seam puckering a bit. Read more
items.author: M.R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy and very comfortable
items.body: This dress was absolutely beautiful. I wore it to a wedding and I loved it. Itâ€™s very stretchy and comfortable. Great quality. Worth the price. Iâ€™m 5â€™2 and about 120 lbs. It fit perfect length and width wise. Read more
items.author: Claudia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress!
items.body: The dress is lovely! It's lined, well constructed, and the seams are flat. It fits my curves very well and has a soft flow with the ruffles. It's a little shorter than I wanted - you can see from the pictures that it hits higher than the description photo, but still fits very nicely. Overall, a beautiful dress and a great color for the holidays! I'm 5'8", 150 pounds, and got a size Large. Read more
items.author: satavo

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but not for me
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Would be perfect with some adjustments. The fabric was a bit cheap-feeling compared to a different dress I ordered from a different seller. The good thing is itâ€™s not see through, the slit doesnâ€™t go up terribly high, but the ruffles could be done better. Doesnâ€™t hug me tight but I am 105lbs and almost no fat. However the other dress did hug me tighter like I wanted. Easy to walk in but would not pay the price itâ€™s listed at for this quality so Iâ€™m returning it. Read more
items.author: Fernanda Estrada

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get compliments with this dress
items.body: Love this dress. So comfortable to wear because of the stretchy material. I bought this for a coctail wedding we attended and got so many compliments. Looks very elegant. Nice for a fall wedding or event. True to size. I wear a medium and weigh 140. I suggest wearing an undergarment to streamline your curves. My only issue was buying one like shorts underneath so I kept hiking one leg up by the dress slit so it wouldn't peek through. Read more
items.author: Tanya Johnson

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Mermaid Ruched Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Mermaid Ruched Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Grey Pink, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Rose Red, Lake Blue, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
